@author develop@teller.finance

@param borrower Account address of the borrower

params.loanID: The ID of the loan to check

collateralToken().return: address Contract address of the token

params.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral for the loan

params.responses: List of structs of the protocol loan responses

ID of the loan to get info for

params.lendingPoolAddress: Contract address of the lending pool
params.loanTermsConsensusAddress: Contract adddress for loan term consensus
params.priceOracleAddress: Contract address of the price oracle
params.settingsAddress: Contract address for the configuration of the platform

lendingPool().return: address Contract address of the lending pool

lendingToken().return: address Contract address of the lending token

params.loanID: The ID of the loan to be liquidated

params.loanID: ID of loan from which collateral was withdrawn

priceOracle().return: address Contract address of the price oracle

params.amount: The amount of tokens to pay back to the loan
params.loanID: The ID of the loan the payment is for

params.amountBorrow: Amount of tokens to be taken out in the loan
params.loanID: The ID of the loan to be taken out

params.amount: The amount of collateral token or ether the caller is hoping to withdraw

cToken().notice: Returns the cToken in the lending pool

canLiquidateLoan(uint256).notice: A loan can be liquidated if it is: under collateralized or expired

createLoanWithTerms((address,address,add.notice: Create a loan with specified terms, if allowed

depositCollateral(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Deposit collateral for a loan, unless it isn't allowed

getBorrowerLoans(address).notice: Returns a list of all loans for a borrower

getCollateralInfo(uint256).notice: Get collateral information of a specific loan

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the current contract instance setting the required parameters, if allowed

lendingPool().notice: Returns the lending token in the lending pool

lendingToken().notice: Returns the lending token in the lending pool

liquidateLoan(uint256).notice: Liquidate a loan if has is expired or under collateralized

loanIDCounter().notice: Returns the ID of loans taken out

loans(uint256).notice: Returns the struct of a loan

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Make a payment to a specified loan

setPriceOracle(address).notice: Updates the current price oracle instance.

tToken().notice: Returns the tToken in the lending pool

takeOutLoan(uint256,uint256).notice: Take out a loan, if allowed

totalCollateral().notice: Returns the total amount of collateral

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw collateral from a loan, unless this isn't allowed
